description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jump in the cockpit of one of the year's most powerful and addicting Indie Games to hit the Marketplace. Featuring a full blown voice acting team, detailed graphics and intense gameplay, Honor In Vengeance will leave you speechless as you fly above Earth as Martian rebel pilot Juno Lucas, fighting for Mars' independence from Earth's abusive grip on the Martian colony.
